attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The app took hours to download and when I went on the app it froze my phone. attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app is a scam, it requires you to leave your cell phone number as a means to receive spam phone calls forcing the idea that you must vote for trump. This is a strategy they hope works based on constant exposure to the stupidity and bias that is behind these calls. Without entering your information you are not allowed to further proceed into the app, preventing those who would like to view the app for purposes such as comedy or to gain more evidence of presidential narcissism from viewing the app.
